ygData.subject: Re: Casting Leering Corpse @ Lvl 9
ygData.msgSnippet: Whoa, if thats true then the magic system in EQ sucks. I mean come on, someone being able to cast a spell and another person not at a certain level purely on a
ygData.messageBody:
Whoa, if thats true then the magic system in EQ sucks. I mean come on,
someone being able to cast a spell and another person not at a certain level
purely on a random roll of something, thats just insane.

Out of curiosity, for those who can cast the spell at level 9 did you guys
pump your conjuration skill at all besides that 1 point to learn it?

----- Original Message -----
From: Howard Chan <hchan@...>
To: <eq_shadowknights@onelist.com>
Sent: Friday, May 14, 1999 2:17 PM
Subject: Re: [eq_shadowknights] Casting Leering Corpse @ Lvl 9


> From: "Howard Chan" <hchan@...>
>
> Nope. Dark Elves should be able to max out the skill before any other
races
> due to their high intelligence. In addition, mana cost for each spell
remain
> the same regardless of what level or skill-level one is at. I believe
that
> the idea of random mana per level is a better explanation.
>
>
> >useful. This included Conjure. I now have over 40 in conjuring, so I'm
> thinking
> >she is right.
>
>
>
